issue.title: [R] Bump default parquet version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16715](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16715). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With ARROW-12203 the default parquet version was bumped for pyarrow to 2.4, at a minimum, we should add 2_4 as a valid version type to https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/9b0afc352e8b3ecb3104d58e4bcf09def256b587/r/R/parquet.R#L239-L242 and https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/9b0afc352e8b3ecb3104d58e4bcf09def256b587/r/R/enums.R#L122-L126

But do we also want to follow pyarrow's lead and bump up to a newer version by default?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16715?focusedCommentId=17565054) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13555
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13555>
